text: acer wants $ 170 to just look at it then add the repair cost on top of that .
update : i repaired it myself for $ 12 .
i had nothing to lose since it was a paper weight otherwise .
the shame of it is knowing it took me 15 minutes and $ 12 to fix it and acer wanted to rob me of $ 170 just to look at it .
first one that they shipped was obviously defective , super slow and speakers were garbled .
the replacement i got was much better , but still too slow for my expectations .
i wound up returning it .
this works fine for that .
october 12 , 2017 - - started having trouble maintaining connection to wifi ( spectrum service ) , but usually after several loops re - entering password , connection would be re - established .
sometimes had to do several times , but thought it might be an idiosyncrady of this model .
now i ' m really bummed that i have a very nice looking chromebook with a beautiful screen that is totally unusable .
i just got this thing today & was really excited about it but this has been frustrating & disappointing .
i ' ll wait a while until this device gets 4 - 5 stars .
there are certain very basic tasks that this computer can do .
a lot of websites don ' t work properly with the chromebook , even though you ' re using the same browser .
overall , this thing can do very basic stuff , sometimes .
pro : light , reasonable price , fast .
keyboard key fragile .
after 6 months my eyboard key is not function very well .
i only use the chormebook for surving the internet , checking my email , and watch hulu or netflix .
this is something to reconsidered if one to buy the chromebook for doing homework and a lot of typing .
up date per may 13 / 2018 about two months ago , the charger wont work .
so latest update the charger only last about one year and the half .
overall , it is not horrible , but i wouldn ' t purchase this model again .
- long battery life
- charges quickly
- screen feels smaller than other of the same size .
it gets two stars because it is a nice light weight and the folding is nice .
two replacements had the same problem all in 4 weeks .
i already returned the first laptop because i had to press extremely hard to get the left click to work .
i ' ve had the device for 4 days now , and it has a number of big issues .
next , is that the track pad is insanely wobbly .
one of the worst offenders is the battery life .
it also refuses to charge past 90 % and instantly jumps to 80 % when i unplug it .
there are issues beyond these , but it ' s all software related so i will let it be .
within two days of receiving this item a line appeared on my screen ( while i was using it , previously fine ) and below it the image / screen flickered .
the flip and touchscreen aspects work fine , no problems .
it can not .
screen looks good , it has a good battery life , keypad has some nice feedback , the works .
but you can ' t use an acer chromebook r 11 this way .
and the chromebook does not go to sleep or otherwise shut off .
loved it for an hour than it went black and we got a chrome os missing or damage message .
terrible product and worse customer service - - do not buy
we ordered this chromebook for my son to use for school .
we received it in august , and it worked fine for just 5 months and then the touch screen stopped working .
it worked properly for less than a week , and the touch screen stopped functioning again .
we contacted both acer and amazon , and they both informed us that it has to be sent back for repairs again .
good display
good battery life
no fans and stays reasonably cool unless you are playing a game .
build quality seems ok , keyboard is not flimsy or too firm .
my understanding is that chromeos is a very light weight so i don ' t know why it lags sometimes with under 10 tabs open and a youtube video playing .
i needed a small chromebook for light web use while traveling and this tablet does ok but considering the price i would have expected a better processor and keyboard lighting .
my main complaint is the battery life , i see many positive reviews about the battery life .
i just find the battery draining to quickly in my opinion .
i tried messing around in the dev mode to adjust the microphone sensitivity but nothing seems to work .

plug - in or usb microphones seem to work fine , so it ' s not a terribly big issue and i don ' t really even use a microphone that often , but it ' s annoying to buy a product and not have it working .
the broken mic was not a dealbreaker but annoying in a brand new device .
in addition , in my short time using the device , i realized how much i dislike having fingerprints on my computer screen .
good looking laptop but hardware has several major problems .
microphone is not really working ( you have to basically yell while alsmost touching it with you lips in order for someone else to hear you ) .
when switching between tablet and laptop mode quickly the screen will blink and turn off for an extended period of time before turning back on .
called acer support , they were completely useless .
keeps disconnecting from my wifi at work .
it was nice when it was working .
i ' ve called twice to try to connect it to printer , first call they told me i had to get a cloud ready printer after getting said printer it still doesn ' t connect .
very disappointed in this machine .
i typically love acers ( i have a regular laptop ) but this machine has been a nightmare .
issue summary : frequent crashing

it frequently crashes by displaying a bizarre screen displaying a large number of short horizontal lines and making a loud alarm noise .
this issue happens more frequently when using netflix ( app or through chrome browser ) .
however it can happen at random , for example when signing into gmail .
it ' s okay for email , facebook , surfing the net , etc .
so , this one isn ' t working out very well for my needs .
i hope it is fixed this time .

has lots of issues , screen freezing , i was hoping to use it for banking etc .

the mousepad was not very responsive .
i really think it ' s junk .
runs good , poor battery life .
this one is horrible , never can connect .
after years of using amazon for hundreds of orders , this is my very first negative review :
i was very excited at the prospect of buying this laptop .
i was very impressed with its sleek design and the speed of the processor itself .
a few hours of use later , i noticed that my battery was very low , around 10 % .
i even tried reinstalling the drivers and doing a system restore , nothing would fix it .
i contacted asus and they could do nothing .
i was so glad that the problem would finally be fixed .
to my great dismay and disappointment , the power icon read the exact same message : ` ` plugged in , not charging ` ` .
this was the second vivobook in a row !
am i just unlucky , or was this a bad batch ?
i ' ve only found 2 other recent reviews of this product that had the same problem ( go ahead and search for them in the reviews ) .
volume was not working .
they would help me only if i bought an ongoing support contract with them .
horrible way to run a company so i returned the item .
i purchased this laptop on the 11th of june 2018 and today is the 25th , which means i have had it for just about 2 weeks .
i noticed yesterday that the laptop was not charging anymore for reasons i can not deduce .
